item.title: Version 57 (2.0.2) subscription
item.description: Thank you for using Gita Way! This release has option to read Gita Ad free. It also has a About Me section. 🙏

item.title: Version 38 (1.5.4) crash fix
item.description: Please upgrade for uninterrupted reading and "Verse of the day" notifications. Namaste and Thank you. 🙏

item.title: Version 35 (1.5.2) subscribe to verse-of-the-day
item.description: Please upgrade to the latest version of Gita to continue receiving "Verse of the day" notifications. Namaste and Thank you. 🙏

item.title: Version 21 (1.4.2) Share
item.description: Thank you for using Gita! This release allows you to share Gita verses with your family and friends. 🙏

item.title: Version 18 (1.3.0) donations - card
item.description: On the auspicious day of Deepavali, we bring you an opportunity to Shine your Light and Drive away Darkness, by funding our mission. 🙏

item.title: Version 13 (1.2.0) notifications
item.description: Thank you for using Gita! This release helps you read a verse every day. It notifies you of the verse of the day.

item.title: Version 8-11 (1.1.4)
item.description: This release helps you use the best features of Gita. It alerts you when app updates are available.
